testcase.classname: Search and place order for vegetables
testcase.name: Search for items and validate results
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Greencart Landing page.....................................passed When User searched for "Cucumber" Vegetable.................................passed Then "Cucumber" results are displayed.......................................passed

testcase.classname: Search and place order for vegetables
testcase.name: Search for items and then move to checkout page
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Greencart Landing page.....................................passed When User searched for "Brinjal" Vegetable..................................passed And Added items to cart.....................................................passed And User proceeded to checkout page.........................................passed Then verify selected "Brinjal" items are displayed in checkout page.........passed
